lead_paragraph: He is the tennis version of the Incredible Hulk and on Sunday Novak Djokovic made his closest rivals turn green with envy as he finally achieved something no man had accomplished for nearly half a century.
snippet: He is the tennis version of the Incredible Hulk and on Sunday Novak Djokovic made his closest rivals turn green with envy as he finally achieved something no man had accomplished for nearly half a century....

headline.main: Djokovic Eyes Golden Slam, Turns Rivals Green With Envy
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Eyes Golden Slam, Turns Rivals Green With Envy
